generic_name: ARNICA MONTANA WHOLE, COPPER, MAGNESIUM PHOSPHATE, DIBASIC TRIHYDRATE, STRYCHNOS NUX-VOMICA SEED, PASSIFLORA INCARNATA TOP, CLAVICEPS PURPUREA SCLEROTIUM
dosage_administration: Adults and children 18 years of age and older: At the onset of symptoms, dissolve 2 tablets in the mouth at bedtime and during the night if needed, for up to 6 times per 24 hours. Children under 18 years of age: Not recommended.
indications: Uses* temporarily relieves nighttime cramps in legs, thighs, calves, feet, and toes with accompanying occasional disrupted sleep
